name: Gucci Intense Oud
description:
Gucci Intense Oud

A luxurious oriental fragrance crafted for true oud lovers.
Deep notes of precious oud, leather, incense, and woody accords deliver a rich and powerful scent experience.
Elegant, mysterious, and refined—ideal for formal occasions and confident personalities.

Perfect choice for men — bold character and exceptional longevity.

name: Jean Paul Gaultier Ultra Male
description:
A modern, seductive, and energetic fragrance.
A delicious blend of pear, vanilla, cinnamon, and lavender creates a sweet yet powerful aroma.
Ideal for nights out and special moments, this fragrance is known for its strong projection and attraction.

Perfect choice for men — bold character and exceptional longevity.

Arabians Tonka is a rich, intense, and captivating oriental fragrance.
A luxurious blend of oud, tonka bean, vanilla, amber, and musk creates a warm, sweet, and addictive scent.
Powerful and long-lasting, this fragrance is perfect for evening wear and cold seasons, leaving a strong and elegant trail that commands attention.

Perfect choice for men — bold character and exceptional longevity.

name: Givenchy – Gentleman

Givenchy Gentleman is a refined and elegant masculine fragrance that embodies modern sophistication and timeless style.
Built around a warm and smooth character, it blends woody, spicy, and sensual accords to create a confident and charismatic scent.
Perfect for men who appreciate class, elegance, and subtle power, this fragrance transitions effortlessly from day to evening, leaving a polished and lasting impression.

Perfect choice for men — bold character and exceptional longevity.

Scandal Elixir is a bold, intense, and highly seductive masculine fragrance.
Designed for confident men, this scent delivers a powerful and luxurious presence from the very first spray.
Rich notes of honey, vanilla, amber, and warm woody accords create a deep, sweet, and addictive aroma.
The fragrance is smooth yet strong, leaving an unforgettable trail that turns heads wherever you go.
Perfect for evening wear and special occasions, Scandal Elixir is a statement fragrance that embodies strength, elegance, and irresistible charm.

Perfect choice for men — bold character and exceptional longevity.

name: Gucci – Gucci Guilty Absolu de Parfum Pour Homme
description:
Gucci Guilty Absolu de Parfum Pour Homme is a bold, intense, and highly distinctive masculine fragrance.
Designed for men who embrace confidence and individuality, this scent delivers a powerful and unconventional character.
A rich composition of leather, patchouli, woody accords, and warm amber notes creates a deep, earthy, and sensual aroma.
Strong yet refined, the fragrance offers excellent longevity and a daring trail that stands apart from classic masculine scents.
Perfect for evening wear and special occasions, Gucci Guilty Absolu de Parfum is made for men who are fearless, elegant, and unapologetically unique.

Perfect choice for men — bold character and exceptional longevity.

Valentino Uomo Born in Roma Extradose is an intense, bold, and modern masculine fragrance.
This scent is designed for men who embrace confidence, individuality, and a strong urban elegance.
A powerful blend of spicy notes, rich vanilla, woody accords, and warm amber creates a deep, sensual, and addictive aroma.
The Extradose version amplifies the signature Born in Roma DNA, delivering stronger projection and exceptional longevity.
Perfect for evening wear and special occasions, this fragrance leaves a magnetic trail that is both refined and daring.

name: Xerjoff – Erba Pura
description:
Xerjoff Erba Pura is a vibrant, luxurious, and addictive unisex fragrance that radiates elegance and joy.
This iconic scent is known for its powerful freshness combined with a rich and sensual base.

A luminous blend of exotic fruits, Sicilian citrus, white musk, amber, and vanilla creates a smooth, sweet, and long-lasting aroma.
Fresh yet creamy, Erba Pura offers exceptional projection and longevity, leaving a bright and elegant trail.

Perfect for both day and evening wear, Erba Pura is ideal for those who love refined freshness with a seductive, modern touch.

Ideal for everyone — fresh, versatile, and effortlessly elegant.

Fresh yet creamy, Erba Pura offers exceptional projection and longevity, leaving a bright and elegant trail.

name: Xerjoff – Naxos
description:
Xerjoff Naxos is a rich, elegant, and iconic unisex fragrance inspired by Italian heritage and timeless luxury.
This masterpiece perfectly balances freshness, sweetness, and depth.

A sophisticated blend of lavender, honey, tobacco, vanilla, and warm spices creates a smooth, creamy, and addictive scent.
The opening is fresh and aromatic, while the dry-down becomes warm, sweet, and sensual with outstanding longevity and projection.

Perfect for both day and evening wear, Naxos is ideal for those who appreciate refinement, confidence, and a luxurious signature scent.

Ideal for everyone — fresh, versatile, and effortlessly elegant.
